description: This file defines the EventRepository class, providing an abstraction layer for managing Event data via Firebase APIs, including listing, creating, updating, deleting, and subscribing to events.

classes.name: EventRepository
classes.description: Provides methods to interact with Event data through Firebase APIs, encapsulating operations like fetch, create, update, delete, and subscribe.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a list of events for a specific user.

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description: Returns a stream of event lists for real-time updates.
